channel.title: Things bouncing around (bm_c3a2h)
channel.description:
[youtube.com/watch?v=IygRS60zpZk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IygRS60zpZk)
Map: bm_c3a2h Game version: default (december 2017) Everything returned to normal after restarting the game. I don't know why that happened, all I can say is that I played the game a bit speedy by rushing through it.

item.title: Things bouncing around (bm_c3a2h)
item.dc:creator: Johnwalter
item.description:
I remember reporting this bug back in 2016.
I think i called it moon gravity?

Anyway, some objects float, some fall through the floor.
But the most interesting thing was that the object that was moving,
once touched another object would make them move the same way.

It was like bowling with barrels.

Read full topic

item.title: Things bouncing around (bm_c3a2h)
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
That’s normal. They’re testing flubber in that part of the facility.

Read full topic

item.title: Things bouncing around (bm_c3a2h)
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
That isnt a bug. That is an undocumented feature.

Read full topic

I don’t know why that happened, all I can say is that I played the game a bit speedy by rushing through it.
